words.meaning: Open to do / to treat a patient or prepare them
I am going to do (placed after the verb)
Something is being done / Going to be done
What is done at the moment / the track (flow of energy)
To move / to pass through / travel
To compose / to fix / to heal / to repair
Taking away from (usually paired with keyo, sowa, pisha etc)
Taking away from (usually paired with keyo, sowa, pisha etc)
A complimentary word (e.g. + Shawan = m + fem plural)
all the spirits below of the...
woman (women) - used the same way as Noma
to open (bodies & minds to healing - not to visions & worlds)
when a diet is pointing down and not straight up
joy / to sing (insect in secular language!)
to show a vision / lead down a path / to guide in the visions
a powerful female doctor of Marusa
a long time ago / of a long time ago
with the words of my song I.... (action word precedes ira)
the movements we make whilst singing
we sing with a good mareacion / connection
Used to draw something out. Used both for bad and good energy. Eg. when you are closing ceremony and want to draw out the marecion from people.
The said spirits are standing in a line in front of the patient
Present. What you are singing about is present.
To terminate/To end (also connotes removing something)
A type of fish with small eggs
Circular movement/swirling (mayonban and other derivatives share this meaning)
Great curanderos of old – seers who could fly /know non-local information
Your (sing) (the person, their body, mind, problems ...)
To wring out (Cleaning, like wringing out the bad energy)
Dancing from side to side (like a snake moves)
airs (spiritual ones emitted by plants and other things)
heardy (Joi notsi – I heard these words)
sin, esp against diet (also signifies issues or problems from daily life)
one who has wisdom (ref. Shipibo curandero of old who could diagnose patients purely by sight or touch)
used to call upon protection/to call on strength- from the elements
to open/close worlds - to remove from one bad world and place in a good one. Also to straighten diet with it is cunina
walking the path of the Kano
tip of (i.e. the tip of the tongue/tip of a sword etc)
all the spirits above the earth
spirits of giant snakes who are 'mothers' of the plants
beautiful/wonderful (everything beautiful - the scents, sounds, spirits, visions, feelings of what you are singing about/to)
Monkey with white markings on face (namesake of Shipibo)
A Tower connecting one to god (sp)
Referencing hearing a sound of something
(Used with jene ts...) The water liquid extract from dieted plant used to wash things
fragmented (eg. Tsokas Shinan - Fragmented Thoughts - used for trauma)
plants dancing in the wind - cyclical movements
we have arrived (us after place arrived in)
chopping something (the act of chopping with a machete)
to gather (used specifically with Yoshin & Samson Mediko)
I do..... (used after the first verb)
I will do..... (used after the first verb)
demon (lit. one with the red eyes)
Give me your knowledge, your wisdom
A connection has recently or just been made
Way of focusing attention and energy, letting the plants know what or who you are working on
Link between verb and action word, with singing I am...
Deepening and focusing what actions are already sung about
Deepening the connection being made/that is present
With great movement/With great energy '...' is being done
I am pleased and all is well
spirits now I call to heal you
men and women all will heal
I am pleased to be with you here
in my visions I'm with you
I call you to this healing place
I call the spirits to heal you
with this prayer I will heal you
spirits of the plants shall come
they will dance among us now
with their joyous dance they heal
to you all I give this prayer
hear you now the words I sing
I am healing it right now
I go to where the illness starts
with my strength I heal you
I seek to name your illness
I search to clean your body now
I sing all full of joy
with my hands I will heal you
I search to treat your body now
with this I now will heal you
for I have found your illness
yes I know from where it comes
spirits come to help me see
I will seek your illness now
in my mouth upon my tongue
with this song I heal you now
that will heal you from your ills
I am healing all your pain
now the healing is all done
so don't be afraid - have faith in god
yet we know of other worlds
we, like healing plants can fly
spirits come and sing with us
with the cushma of my diet
the cushma of the plants I dieted
I put it on to wear it and protect myself
and the crown of my diets
of the plants I carry inside of me
I wear it to protect and guide me
and to the top of the tree as well
I prepare to go there and work
with my words and singing I seat myself there
in the top of the tree I work and sing through my pipe
this great machine of the plants
through the magnetic resonance of my machine
and in the powerful singing that flows through me
I seat myself here in the center of my machine
sitting myself here to work and sing
the dark energies that swirl around us
I fan these away with the great winds of the plants
my energies are like sweet smelling perfumes
the female masters of the plants
to the illuminated visions of God
I talk to the messenger birds
who tell me what they see
with my power and airs I will design the world
I'm protecting everyone and the whole world
I will arrive at an ocean and within this ocean
I arrive in heaven / I purify you all
and here I walk and converse with aliens
to adorn our bodies with patterns
to adorn our bodies with designs
and these designs signify that we are strong
world of the gods of Noyarao
connecting to the world of god
remove your bad spirits and energy
walked where the Noyarao world ends
from there the people of Noaya Rao came to heal you
happy because they saw you healthy
a repeated chant or healing sound
I wear my snake around my neck
are placed in a cross in front of me
and I activate them with the words of my song
when in trouble, crossed, being attacked etc
I am cleaning and taking away
the bad things I am experiencing (in my mareaicion)
the line of my diet sins
I wash them with the blood of God
blood that is exists beyond sin
that you have gathered to yourself
to the things I have seen in your body

suffixes.usage: Words ending in -bi indicates singular, yet it has an invitational quality
Certain familiar words augmented with the suffix -i indicates the past tense
Words or phrases ending in -shon become commands
Words with -mea give the sense of from, coming from
Means here and beyond all time

suffixes.meaning: something that has happened a long time ago / already established
suffixes.usage: Something that has happened a long time ago / Already established

suffixes.meaning: something that is already in place/stuck
suffixes.usage: Something that is already in place/stuck

suffixes.meaning: emphasizing what will be done / bringing it to attention
suffixes.usage: Emphasizing what will be done / Bringing it to attention

suffixes.meaning: enhances and deepens whatever action is present
